item.title: SingleCellTools
item.description: Selected tools for single-cell and spatial transcriptomics. scRNA-seq ALRA: Zero-preserving imputation HotSpot: identifies informative gene modules (pip install hotspotsc==0.9.1) SCENIC/pySCENIC: Single-cell regulatory network and clustering PROGENy & decoupleR: inference of pathway activities (human & mouse) MetaNeighbor: characterizing the replicability of cell types across datasets (R) SAMap: mapping cell atlas manifolds across species (py) MAGIC: imputing missing values and restoring the structure of single-cell data (R & py) spatial transcriptomics Giotto: toolbox for integrative analysis of spatial data (datasets) (GittoSuite) SpatialDE: identification of spatially variable genes (py) Spark: Statistical analysis of spatial expression patterns BayesSpace: Clustering and Resolution Enhancement of Spatial Transcriptomes SpaGCN: spatial domains and SVGs by graph convolutional network stLearn: downstream analysis toolkit for Spatial Transcriptomic data GCNG: GCN for inferring cell-cell interactions SpaOTsc: spatial optimal transport for SC data (py) DSSC: Deep Spatially constrained Single-cell Clustering (using spatial information and marker genes) RCTD: Robust Cell Type Decomposition C-SIDE: Cell type-specific inference of differential expression (spacexr = RCTD + C-SIDE; Vignettes) Integration of single cell data Benchmarking analysis Benchmarking spatial and single-cell transcriptomics integration methods for transcript distribution prediction and cell type deconvolution Selected tools PASTE: Alignment and integration of spatial transcriptomics data from multiple adjacent tissue slices (Python) GLUE: Multi-omics single-cell data integration and regulatory inference with graph-linked embedding (Python/R) CellTrek: Spatial charting of single-cell transcriptomes in tissues (R) Tangram: aligns sc/snRNA-seq data to spatial data (Python) SPOTlight: integration of Spatial Transcriptomics with scRNA-seq data to infer the location of cell types and states (R) Harmony: Fast, sensitive and accurate integration of single-cell data (R) cell2location: Cell2location maps fine-grained cell types in spatial transcriptomics (Python) Single cell data interactive visualisation Comparison of visualization tools for single-cell RNAseq data Seurat interactive plotting (HoverLocator()) Plotly.
